bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Alternative Names nei wai zhang yi 內 外障翳 , internal and external obstructive shade; nei wai zhang yan 內外障眼 , internally and externally obstructed eye. Illness Sign Combined Designation of nei zhang 內障 , internal screen, and wai zhang 外障 , external screen. Sheng ji zong lu 聖濟總錄 102: 頭風、內外障、青盲、攀睛翳膜悉治，填睛育嬰丸方 , “Recipe for ‘pills to fill the eyeballs and raise an infant’ that cure head wind, internal and external screen , green blindness and shade membranes covering the eyeballs alike”.
